info.name: † Spells of Magic Dark Theme †
info.description:
Dark theme for Spells of Magic that also removes the ads. There are still a few minor bugs that need to be fixed.
──↝⊰ ∙✦∙ ⊱↜──
Previously known as unholymaster, my last account was banned, so I'm reposting all of my styles.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 3.0, currently working on new gypsy image for Ask Mora
